description.narrative: 1. Demonstration effect: The Project will serve as a role model for rooftop generation of solar power. It is expected that after implementation of the Project, the Govt. of Gujarat will roll out larger rooftop programs in Gandhinagar as well as other cities in the state. Other states such as Rajasthan are also expected to follow suit. 2.Private Sector Development in Solar Rooftop Energy Generation: The Project is first public private partnership (PPP) for rooftop solar generation. IFC support to a roof top solar project will help to attract other potential sponsors to such nascent clean energy program. 3. Contribution to Climate Change Mitigation: The Project helps mitigate adverse climate change impacts by tapping in to clean and renewable energy source.

Azure Sun Energy Private Limited (Azure Sun) is a 100% subsidiary of Azure Power India Private Limited (AZI), an existing IFC client. Azure Sun has been awarded a 25-year concession to construct and operate a 2.5 MW rooftop solar power (Project) in Gandhinagar by the Government of Gujarat. This concession was awarded through a process of competitive bidding. The power generated under the Project will be sold at a pre-agreed tariff to Torrent Power Limited (TPL), a privately owned distribution company that holds the license for electricity distribution in Gandhinagar and several other cities in Gujarat. About 80% of the roof top solar panels will be installed on the roofs of government buildings, while the balance 20% will be installed on the roofs of privately-owned buildings.
